values.title: Tabs problem when editing existing tasks

values.description:
This pull requests adds a test via the REST api that:

uses create_cloudsim to launch an AWS CloudSim instance from a machine without CloudSim installed (cloudsim/tools/rest_test_integration_test.py)

* Starts a simulation-stable constellation from the CloudSim instance
* Adds a simulation task.
* Runs a simulation task
* Stops the simulation task
* terminates the simulator
* terminates the CloudSim instance

For this to work, the update and launch mechanism where changed to remove dependencies on an installed CloudSim (/var/www-cloudsimauth/cloudsim.zip, /etc/apache2/apache2.conf and the configuration information in Redis)

The CloudSimRestApi class was updated to include task management.

Unit tests for the simulator and CloudSim constellations was also updated.
values.title: CloudSim 1.7.1 with Jenkins automated test

summary.raw:
This pull requests adds a test via the REST api that:

uses create_cloudsim to launch an AWS CloudSim instance from a machine without CloudSim installed (cloudsim/tools/rest_test_integration_test.py)

* Starts a simulation-stable constellation from the CloudSim instance
* Adds a simulation task.
* Runs a simulation task
* Stops the simulation task
* terminates the simulator
* terminates the CloudSim instance

For this to work, the update and launch mechanism where changed to remove dependencies on an installed CloudSim (/var/www-cloudsimauth/cloudsim.zip, /etc/apache2/apache2.conf and the configuration information in Redis)

The CloudSimRestApi class was updated to include task management.

Unit tests for the simulator and CloudSim constellations was also updated.
summary.html:
This pull requests adds a test via the REST api that:

uses create_cloudsim to launch an AWS CloudSim instance from a machine without CloudSim installed (cloudsim/tools/rest_test_integration_test.py)

  • Starts a simulation-stable constellation from the CloudSim instance
  • Adds a simulation task.
  • Runs a simulation task
  • Stops the simulation task
  • terminates the simulator
  • terminates the CloudSim instance

For this to work, the update and launch mechanism where changed to remove dependencies on an installed CloudSim (/var/www-cloudsimauth/cloudsim.zip, /etc/apache2/apache2.conf and the configuration information in Redis)

The CloudSimRestApi class was updated to include task management.

Unit tests for the simulator and CloudSim constellations was also updated.

values.description:
Added a way to enumerate tasks information from the REST API.

The information was already in get_constellation_data, so it was easier than anticipated.

Fix a javascript potential problem where a msg variable was declared globally
values.title: List tasks for a constellation

The new AMIs  are added for g2
